title: We all had that one 'support'
body:
{{champion:133}}  Man, we're really lacking vision....wait a minute, support why don't you have a sightstone?
{{champion:99}} Can't
{{champion:133}} Why not?
{{champion:99}}  Don't have enough gold
{{champion:133}} But you stole all my kills and taken half my CS....where did all that gold go to?

{{champion:99}} : http://i.imgur.com/V9VUoJK.jpg

{{champion:133}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:104}} :{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: that one person that goes quinn adc instead of quinn top
I played against a Quinn adc once. They had a Graves support.
inb4 somebody posts the "death is the best cc" comic

Did you just assume her role? Just because she cares about her support providing vision doesn't mean she's ADC, that's stereotype. It could as well be Graves Mid, Gnar Jungle, Quinn Top and Ekko ADC. And for your information, there is actually spectrum of 200 roles, not just 5.
#\#allrolesmatter

> [{quoted}](name=ChromaSpell,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4HVuxy94,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-31T12:06:54.679+0000)
>
> that one person that goes quinn adc instead of quinn top

At least that way top laners won't QQ about quinn...as much.
TBH Quinn roams so well I wouldn't be surprised if she ended up there too.

story of my life =)
I like taking Quinn bot for the challenge and fairness [not being cancer for enemy top (most often melee)]
http://i.imgur.com/WZAawn7.gif?Noredirect

"Support": _What do you mean I'm not supporting properly? i have {{item:2301}}!_

Others: Yes, and {{item:3089}}{{item:3135}}{{item:3020}}{{item:3165}}{{item:3116}} 

"Support": _So?_

You are taking all the kills...

"Support": _Death is the best CC._
Not too far from Zyra's build.
I'm pretty sure Zyra's include a liandry's somewhere though

Actually, Liandry's is luxury on Zyra now. You need Eye, Sorc Shoes, and Rylai's as core. Morello for the CDR/Mana, Void Staff is objectively better for penetration than Liandry's, and then that just leaves the choice of Rabadon's, Luden's, or Liandry's...
If you really want to be tank-busting, you build Liandry's, but otherwise there's no point in picking it over Rabadon's if you want damage output.
Didn't know (obviously I don't play Zyra) mb.

Nah, it's not something well known. People are still building Zyra without Morello.
And I'm in the minority when I play with Morello and DFT, anyways.
That's why I said it's "not too far from" rather than right on.
Seems legit to me.
#I Am De Captain Now

If you support has all those items you got cucked.  You are now the support and they are the carry adn its your duty to support them if you want to win the game.  Because they have all the gold and xp advantage.

{{champion:161}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3117}} 

Got a better way to fund my research?

All that AP, to just forget about {{item:3020}}

:O
Later? If you don't buy them first there's no point. Flat penetration is crap late game.

Never said to buy them late. By "later" I didn't mean late-game. I never buy boots as a 4th-6th item...

Whatever... Fixed. ;)
Still a pointless purchase buy on True Damage Vek'Koz. Although I'd personally get Swiftness and kill Air Drakes. He's the kite king - it's no good if he slows down in combat.
But doesn't dealing damage disable mobis
That's why I said I prefer Swiftness to Mobis... Mobis are still a good choice for supports, though.

Slower mid queue, faster support queue.

Thus, Burst Mages for supports.
Yes but the least they could do is buy a sight stone for 800G...

If it's any consolation, no matter who I play as support (Brand, Shaco, Swain, Thresh, Raka, Veigar, so on), I always finish my sightstone item first no matter what the rest of my build looks like. 

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JJxfdGqVRsU/WBSLb6jGx6I/AAAAAAAAXCY/CVKR0i2cFNc9NLe1uNVGn9yOC8v_x2amgCLcB/s1600/2.gif

The amount of people who don't get it's a joke is too damn high!

I am not generalising lux support mains, most of them are great (from my experience)!
I am not against AP builds supports. Just against 'just' AP builds. (get a {{item:2301}} god dammit)
I could have just as easily put other champs (MF instead of Lux for egsample)

All I want is to make the people of the boards smile with my memes and if I did then thank you for smiling and have a good day!

Don't worry lol. I laughed!

Was pointing it out just in case, maybe I got carried away by the bad memories but... whatever xD
---
Have a nice day you too! :P

Wait, no one got the REAL joke... 

That's a Quinn ADC, who plays Quinn ADC?
The people who also play Kalista.
*rise hand*
I do. Blinds are OP.
The point wasnt to generalize lux supports, just "supports". The people who say they are gonna go support, but do nothing to actually support, unless it will get them the kill.
Or {{item:3174}} I sometimes play lux supp in norms just to have fun without dealing with assassins
I don't even bother warding anywhere below gold cause my adc is just gonna get caught anyway.{{champion:67}}

This
Is
Tru
The real joke is the {{champion:133}} adc.

> [{quoted}](name=abdul569,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4HVuxy94,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-31T12:00:42.350+0000)
>
> {{champion:133}}  Man, we&#039;re really lacking vision....wait a minute, support why don&#039;t you have a sightstone?
> {{champion:99}} Can&#039;t
> {{champion:133}} Why not?
> {{champion:99}}  Don&#039;t have enough gold
> {{champion:133}} But you stole all my kills and taken half my CS....where did all that gold go to?
> 
> {{champion:99}} : http://i.imgur.com/V9VUoJK.jpg
> 
> {{champion:133}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:104}} :{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Pretty much every other game.

So that Quinn is one of those ADCs who thinks that only the support is supposed to ward and never uses her fucking trinket even once?

Lovely.

I always ward, doesn't matter which role I am playing.
But believe me, I saw enough "supports" not warding all game at all.

Everyone should ward, that is absolutely true. To be correct: everyone should ward at their full potential. It just turns out that supports have a bigger potential of warding because of the support items. And if they even bought this item and just never use it..... that really tilts me.
It's always Lux supports too. I go bananas on them in champ select that they better buy a sightstone because I have been screwed over by their foolishness too many times.
If they get support and don't actually support it's a reportable offense
Well you could just build it yourself if you really want one that bad
